data.text: @CheriseRohr @DiegoBernalTX @FiestaSA @Cornyation @KingWilliamFair ARTS SA brought the Joffrey Ballet to SA and made special Fiesta medals to celebrate them.  They had no idea what medals were about, said they never saw anything like them before but they wore them proudly.
@CheriseRohr @FiestaSA @Cornyation @KingWilliamFair You can’t explain it, you just have to be here!!

@CheriseRohr @FiestaSA @Cornyation @KingWilliamFair Just how it overtakes the city. It’s everywhere. It has its own customs and traditions. 

It’s not the same, but as a point of reference it gets people in the mindset re: scale and relevance.

@DiegoBernalTX @FiestaSA @Cornyation @KingWilliamFair I honestly don't think it compares to Mardi Gras. It is SO extra. Especially when you add in all the pre-Fiesta events. And how to explain the medals?!
@CheriseRohr @FiestaSA @Cornyation @KingWilliamFair I say kind of like a San Antonio family-friendly Mari Gras and they kind of get it.

@CheriseRohr @FiestaSA @Cornyation @KingWilliamFair The best way I have is Tex-Mex Mardi Gras but extra crazy. I just read a book that mentioned Mardi Gras to my students and explained it as New Orleans Fiesta and they mostly got it.
